name: mathsolve-ai
description: AI-powered mathematics learning and problem-solving platform
author: MathSolve AI Team

scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow" --names "WEB,API,MCP" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:api && npm run build:mcp
scripts.start: concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow" --names "WEB,API,MCP" "npm run start:web" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:mcp"
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:api && npm run test:mcp
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:mcp
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next apps/*/.turbo node_modules
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run setup to initialize the development environment'
